summary: This bill, H.R. 4747, proposes to amend the Dayton Aviation Heritage Preservation Act of 1992. It specifically focuses on adjusting the boundary of the Dayton Aviation Heritage National Historical Park to include approximately 1 acre of land in Dayton, Ohio. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives on July 23, 2025, by Mr. Turner of Ohio and Mr. Landsman, and referred to the Committee on Natural Resources.
